attributes.action: recommend that Eric Morecambe and Ernie Wise receive posthumous knighthoods.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These two were our jewels in the crown when it came to British comedy.
There have been many imitations but nobody has ever surpassed them when it comes to making people laugh.
Show their families our gratitude and make sure they are never forgotten.

rejection.details: Sorry, we're no longer accepting posthumous honour requests
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
